Name: Demonic Ascendance
Story Background: In the black of night, a dark ritual unfolds, offering power in exchange for a soul.
Ability: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature card from it and put it onto the battlefield under your control. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Appearance Description: A swirling vortex of shadows forms above the heads of two figures, one looking desperate and the other empowered by dark energies.
